DashboardDefinitionComponents.Parameters:
[{"WidgetSubTitle":"","WidgetType":"grid","WidgetFilterField":"","WidgetColor":"","WidgetFrameStyle":{},"WidgetXPosition":0,"WidgetYPosition":22,"WidgetRows":3,"WidgetColumns":6,"WidgetHeader":{"showTitle":false,"showSubTitle":false,"WidgetMetrics":{"visible":false,"Metrics":[]},"WidgetPeriodChooser":{"visible":false,"type":"","startDate":null,"endDate":null}},"WidgetDataSources":{"main":{"type":"querytext","value":"with CurrentUserPermissions as (
    select  ucdd.Company as Company,
            ucdd.Division as Division,
            ucdd.Department as Department
    from    SkillUsersCompaniesDivisionsDepartments ucdd
    where   ucdd.[User] = @CurrentUserId
) 
select  count(*) as Total
from    Deliverable d,
        [WorkflowState] ws,
        [WorkflowStateType] wst 
where   cast(d.AgreedDate as date) < cast(GetDate() as date) and
        ws.[Oid] = d.[WorkflowState] and
        wst.[Oid] = ws.[WorkflowStateType] and
        wst.[Status] = 4 and
        exists (
            select  1
            from    CurrentUserPermissions cup
            where   d.Company = cup.Company and
                    d.Division = cup.Division and
                    d.Department = cup.Department 
        ) and
        (d.[Company]  = @Company or @Company = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') and
        (d.[Division] = @Division or @Division = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') and
        (d.[Department] = @Department or @Department = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000')
        and ('00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000' in (@ClientOid) or d.Client in (@ClientOid))
        and ('00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000' in (@ProjectOid) or d.Project in (@ProjectOid))","mapping":""}},"Filters":{},"QueryConfiguration":{"PreviousPeriod":{"Show":false,"KeyFieldName":"","Type":0},"RequiredFilters":["Company","Division","Department","ClientOid","ProjectOid","UserOid"]}}]

[{"WidgetSubTitle":"","WidgetType":"grid","WidgetFilterField":"","WidgetColor":"","WidgetFrameStyle":{},"WidgetXPosition":33,"WidgetYPosition":22,"WidgetRows":3,"WidgetColumns":5,"WidgetHeader":{"showTitle":false,"showSubTitle":false,"WidgetMetrics":{"visible":false,"Metrics":[]},"WidgetPeriodChooser":{"visible":false,"type":"","startDate":null,"endDate":null}},"WidgetDataSources":{"main":{"type":"querytext","value":"with CurrentUserPermissions as (

from    Deliverable d,

where   cast(d.AgreedDate as date) = dateadd(day, 2, cast(GetDate() as date)) and
        ws.[Oid] = d.[WorkflowState] and
        wst.[Oid] = ws.[WorkflowStateType] and
        wst.[Status] = 4 and

        and ('00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000' in (@ClientOid) or d.Client in (@ClientOid))
        and ('00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000' in (@ProjectOid) or d.Project in (@ProjectOid))","mapping":""}},"Filters":{},"QueryConfiguration":{"PreviousPeriod":{"Show":false,"KeyFieldName":"","Type":0},"RequiredFilters":["Company","Division","Department","ClientOid","ProjectOid","UserOid"]}}]

DashboardDefinitionComponents.Name: Cliente, Projecto e User
DashboardDefinitionComponents.Parameters:
[{"WidgetSubTitle":"","WidgetType":"tag","WidgetFilterField":"","WidgetColor":"#e0e0e0","WidgetFrameStyle":{},"WidgetXPosition":28,"WidgetYPosition":0,"WidgetRows":2,"WidgetColumns":20,"WidgetHeader":{"showTitle":false,"showSubTitle":false,"WidgetMetrics":{"visible":false,"Metrics":[]},"WidgetPeriodChooser":{"visible":false,"type":"","startDate":null,"endDate":null}},"WidgetDataSources":{"main":{"type":"querytext","value":"			with t as
(
    select  d.Client,
            d.Project,
            d.Oid
    from    Deliverable d,
            [WorkflowState] ws, 
            [WorkflowStateType] wst
    where 	ws.[Oid] = d.[WorkflowState] and
            wst.[Oid] = ws.[WorkflowStateType] and
            wst.[Status] = 4 and
            cast(d.AgreedDate as date) <= cast(GetDate() as date) and
            ((d.[Company]  = @Company or @Company = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000')) and
            ((d.[Division] = @Division or @Division = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000')) and
            ((d.[Department] = @Department or @Department = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000'))
)
select  distinct
        'Client' as GroupName, 
        'ClientOid' as GroupId, 
        c.NameAndExternalId as Name, 
        c.Oid as Oid
from    CommercialClient c, t
where   c.Oid = t.Client
union all
select  distinct 
        'Project' as GroupName, 
        'ProjectOid' as GroupId, 
        p.NameAndExternalId,
		p.Oid
from    Project p, t
where   p.Oid = t.Project
union all
select  distinct 
        'User' as GroupName, 
        'UserOid' as GroupId, 
        u.Name, 
        u.Oid 
from    [User] u, t, Assignment ass, AssignmentType ast
where   ass.DocumentOid = t.Oid and 
        ast.Name = 'Executor' and 
        ass.AssignmentType = ast.Oid and 
        ass.[User] = u.Oid
order by 1, 3","mapping":{"groupExpr":"GroupName","groupId":"GroupId","displayExpr":"Name","valueExpr":"Oid"}}},"Filters":{},"QueryConfiguration":{"PreviousPeriod":{"Show":false,"KeyFieldName":"","Type":0},"RequiredFilters":["Company","Division","Department"]}}]

[{"WidgetSubTitle":"","WidgetType":"grid","WidgetFilterField":"","WidgetColor":"","WidgetFrameStyle":{},"WidgetXPosition":28,"WidgetYPosition":22,"WidgetRows":3,"WidgetColumns":5,"WidgetHeader":{"showTitle":false,"showSubTitle":false,"WidgetMetrics":{"visible":false,"Metrics":[]},"WidgetPeriodChooser":{"visible":false,"type":"","startDate":null,"endDate":null}},"WidgetDataSources":{"main":{"type":"querytext","value":"with CurrentUserPermissions as (
    select  ucdd.Company as Company,
            ucdd.Division as Division,
            ucdd.Department as Department
    from    SkillUsersCompaniesDivisionsDepartments ucdd
    where   ucdd.[User] = @CurrentUserId
) 
select  count(*) as Total
from    Deliverable d,
        [WorkflowState] ws,
        [WorkflowStateType] wst 
where   cast(d.AgreedDate as date) = dateadd(day, 1, cast(GetDate() as date)) and
        ws.[Oid] = d.[WorkflowState] and
        wst.[Oid] = ws.[WorkflowStateType] and
        wst.[Status] = 4 and
        exists (
            select  1
            from    CurrentUserPermissions cup
            where   d.Company = cup.Company and
                    d.Division = cup.Division and
                    d.Department = cup.Department 
        ) and
        (d.[Company]  = @Company or @Company = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') and
        (d.[Division] = @Division or @Division = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') and
        (d.[Department] = @Department or @Department = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000')
        and ('00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000' in (@ClientOid) or d.Client in (@ClientOid))
        and ('00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000' in (@ProjectOid) or d.Project in (@ProjectOid))","mapping":""}},"Filters":{},"QueryConfiguration":{"PreviousPeriod":{"Show":false,"KeyFieldName":"","Type":0},"RequiredFilters":["Company","Division","Department","ClientOid","ProjectOid","UserOid"]}}]

[{"WidgetSubTitle":"","WidgetType":"grid","WidgetFilterField":"","WidgetColor":"","WidgetFrameStyle":{},"WidgetXPosition":38,"WidgetYPosition":22,"WidgetRows":3,"WidgetColumns":4,"WidgetHeader":{"showTitle":false,"showSubTitle":false,"WidgetMetrics":{"visible":false,"Metrics":[]},"WidgetPeriodChooser":{"visible":false,"type":"","startDate":null,"endDate":null}},"WidgetDataSources":{"main":{"type":"querytext","value":"with CurrentUserPermissions as (
    select  ucdd.Company as Company,
            ucdd.Division as Division,
            ucdd.Department as Department
    from    SkillUsersCompaniesDivisionsDepartments ucdd
    where   ucdd.[User] = @CurrentUserId
) 
select  count(*) as Total
from    Deliverable d,
        [WorkflowState] ws,
        [WorkflowStateType] wst 
where   cast(d.AgreedDate as date) = dateadd(day, 3, cast(GetDate() as date)) and
        ws.[Oid] = d.[WorkflowState] and
        wst.[Oid] = ws.[WorkflowStateType] and
        wst.[Status] = 4 and
        exists (
            select  1
            from    CurrentUserPermissions cup
            where   d.Company = cup.Company and
                    d.Division = cup.Division and
                    d.Department = cup.Department 
        ) and
        (d.[Company]  = @Company or @Company = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') and
        (d.[Division] = @Division or @Division = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') and
        (d.[Department] = @Department or @Department = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000')
        and ('00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000' in (@ClientOid) or d.Client in (@ClientOid))
        and ('00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000' in (@ProjectOid) or d.Project in (@ProjectOid))","mapping":""}},"Filters":{},"QueryConfiguration":{"PreviousPeriod":{"Show":false,"KeyFieldName":"","Type":0},"RequiredFilters":["Company","Division","Department","ClientOid","ProjectOid","UserOid"]}}]

DashboardDefinitionComponents.Name: Atividades em Tempo Real
DashboardDefinitionComponents.Parameters:
[{"WidgetSubTitle":"","WidgetType":"grid","WidgetFilterField":"","WidgetColor":"","WidgetFrameStyle":{},"WidgetXPosition":0,"WidgetYPosition":2,"WidgetRows":20,"WidgetColumns":28,"WidgetHeader":{"showTitle":true,"showSubTitle":false,"WidgetMetrics":{"visible":false,"Metrics":[]},"WidgetPeriodChooser":{"visible":false,"type":"","startDate":null,"endDate":null}},"WidgetDataSources":{"main":{"type":"querytext","value":"with CurrentUserPermissions as (
    select  ucdd.Company as Company,
            ucdd.Division as Division,
            ucdd.Department as Department
    from    SkillUsersCompaniesDivisionsDepartments ucdd
    where   ucdd.[User] = @CurrentUserId
) 
select 	d.Oid as Id,
        d.CreatedBy as UserId, 
		(select STRING_AGG(convert(nvarchar(50), ass.[User]), ',') from Assignment ass, AssignmentType ast, [User] u where 
            ass.DocumentOid = d.Oid and ast.Name = 'Executor' and ass.AssignmentType = ast.Oid and ass.[User] = u.Oid) as ExecutorId,
        (select STRING_AGG(convert(nvarchar(50), u.[Name]), ',') from Assignment ass, AssignmentType ast, [User] u where 
            ass.DocumentOid = d.Oid and ast.Name = 'Executor' and ass.AssignmentType = ast.Oid and ass.[User] = u.Oid) as ExecutorName,
        (select STRING_AGG(convert(nvarchar(50), u.[HasImage]), ',') from Assignment ass, AssignmentType ast, [User] u where 
            ass.DocumentOid = d.Oid and ast.Name = 'Executor' and ass.AssignmentType = ast.Oid and ass.[User] = u.Oid) as ExecutorHasImage,    
		d.NameAndExternalId as Name,
		d.AgreedDate as Date,
		cc.Name as Client,
		cc.HasImage as ClientHasImage,
		cc.Oid as ClientId,
		ws.[Name] as [Stage],
        isnull(ws.Color, wst.Color) as StageColor
from    [CommercialClient] cc,  
        Deliverable d,
        [WorkflowState] ws, 
        [WorkflowStateType] wst
where 	cc.Oid = d.Client and
        ws.[Oid] = d.[WorkflowState] and
        wst.[Oid] = ws.[WorkflowStateType] and
		wst.[Status] = 4 and
        exists (
            select  1
            from    CurrentUserPermissions cup
            where   d.Company = cup.Company and
                    d.Division = cup.Division and
                    d.Department = cup.Department 
        ) and 
		cast(d.AgreedDate as date) <= cast(GetDate() as date) and
		((d.[Company]  = @Company or @Company = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000')) and
		((d.[Division] = @Division or @Division = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000')) and
		((d.[Department] = @Department or @Department = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000')) and
		('00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000' in (@ClientOid) or d.Client in (@ClientOid)) and
        ('00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000' in (@ProjectOid) or d.Project in (@ProjectOid))
order by d.AgreedDate desc","mapping":""}},"Filters":{},"QueryConfiguration":{"PreviousPeriod":{"Show":false,"KeyFieldName":"","Type":0},"RequiredFilters":["Company","Division","Department","ClientOid","ProjectOid","UserOid"]}}]

DashboardDefinitionComponents.Name: Status de Atividades por Cliente
DashboardDefinitionComponents.Parameters:
[{"WidgetSubTitle":"","WidgetType":"grid","WidgetFilterField":"","WidgetColor":"","WidgetFrameStyle":{},"WidgetXPosition":28,"WidgetYPosition":2,"WidgetRows":20,"WidgetColumns":20,"WidgetHeader":{"showTitle":true,"showSubTitle":false,"WidgetMetrics":{"visible":false,"Metrics":[]},"WidgetPeriodChooser":{"visible":false,"type":"","startDate":null,"endDate":null}},"WidgetDataSources":{"main":{"type":"querytext","value":"with CurrentUserPermissions as (
    select  ucdd.Company as Company,
            ucdd.Division as Division,
            ucdd.Department as Department
    from    SkillUsersCompaniesDivisionsDepartments ucdd
    where   ucdd.[User] = @CurrentUserId
) 
select  cc.Oid as ClientId, 
        cc.[Name] as ClientName, 
        cc.[HasImage] as ClientHasImage,
        sum(iif(wst.[Status] = 4 and cast(d.AgreedDate as date) < cast(GetDate() as date), 1, 0)) as Delayed,
        sum(iif(wst.[Status] = 4 and cast(d.AgreedDate as date) = cast(GetDate() as date), 1, 0)) as InProgress,
        sum(iif(wst.[Status] != 4 and cast(d.AgreedDate as date) = cast(GetDate() as date), 1, 0)) as Done
from    Deliverable d,
        [WorkflowState] ws,
        [WorkflowStateType] wst,
        [CommercialClient] cc
where   ws.[Oid] = d.[WorkflowState] and
        wst.[Oid] = ws.[WorkflowStateType] and
        wst.[Status] in (4, 5, 6, 10) and
        cast(d.AgreedDate as date) <= cast(GetDate() as date) and
        cc.[Oid] = d.[Client] and
        exists (
            select  1
            from    CurrentUserPermissions cup
            where   d.Company = cup.Company and
                    d.Division = cup.Division and
                    d.Department = cup.Department 
        ) and
        (d.[Company]  = @Company or @Company = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') and
        (d.[Division] = @Division or @Division = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') and
        (d.[Department] = @Department or @Department = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') and
        ('00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000' in (@ClientOid) or d.Client in (@ClientOid)) and
        ('00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000' in (@ProjectOid) or d.Project in (@ProjectOid)) 
group by cc.Oid, cc.[Name], cc.[HasImage]","mapping":""}},"Filters":{},"QueryConfiguration":{"PreviousPeriod":{"Show":false,"KeyFieldName":"","Type":0},"RequiredFilters":["Company","Division","Department","ProjectOid","ClientOid","UserOid"]}}]

DashboardDefinitionComponents.Name: Filtros por Companhia, Divisão e Departamento
